entity.name: Big Brother Brasil
entity.description:
Acompanhe as novidades da 20ª edição do BBB, confira as reações do pessoal ao programa de hoje e fique por dentro das movimentações e estratégias rolando dentro desta 'nave louca'. Será que seu brother/sister preferido irá vencer o prêmio de R$ 1,5 milhão? 

Foto via @BBB

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Prior to Coronavirus, 4 yr. Fed. deficit total under Obama was $2,189 billion vs.Trump's  $3,429 (yr. 2020 projected). Our Federal DEFICIT WILL HAVE GONE UP BY ALMOST 57% under his admin. WHERE IS REPUBLICAN'S “CONSERVATIVE” VALUES HERE?
